title: Woman who married into a farm family, fine fingers of a future wife
overview: Kasumi is physically and emotionally exhausted from juggling her busy work life in the city and her married life. In an attempt to get a divorce and rebuild herself from scratch, she bought an old house and farm in the quiet countryside and left the city. She tried to cultivate the fields but was at a loss as it was her first time farming and it did not go well. Then an elderly neighbour appears who calls out to her and helps her...
